```{r, echo=FALSE}
t = data.frame()
for (doc in seq(1,length(acq))){
  currDoc = acq[doc]
  docTermMatrix <- as.matrix(DocumentTermMatrix(currDoc))
  t <- rbind(t, rowSums(docTermMatrix)[[1]])
}
top_15_documents <- acq[order(t)[1:15]]

top_15_documents[[5]]$content
```

```{r}
find.text <- function(corpus, text) {
  for(i in seq(1, length(corpus))) {
    doc <- acq[i]
    matches <- str_locate_all(doc[[1]]$content, text)
    if(nrow(matches[[1]]) > 0) {
      for(j in seq(1, nrow(matches[[1]]))) {
        index <- matches[[1]][j, 1]
        line_num = str_count(substr(doc[[1]]$content, 1, index), "\n") + 1
        
        print(paste("Document:", i, " Line:", line_num, " Index:", index))
      }
    }
  }
}

find.text(acq, "reporting")
```
